senses.sense_definition: Resembling a varix; having the appearance of a swollen, twisted, or knotted vein.

examples.text: The pathologist noted the <w>varicoid</w> nature of the vessels, which appeared unusually twisted and dilated.
Although the growth was benign, its <w>varicoid</w> shape caused concern due to its resemblance to a diseased vein.
